summary: We all love our little murderous goth assassin so now she can come with us as a "competent" follower. She will level with you as a Necromancer (fitting in my opinion), will fight along side of you bravely, and has no more face paint. Custom hair is now included with the mod making it standalone. There are no other requirements.
descriptionHtml:
[center]We all love our little murderous goth assassin so now she can come with us as a "competent" follower. She will level with you as a Necromancer (fitting in my opinion), will fight along side of you bravely, and has no more face paint. Her level cap is now 100 and she excels at conjuration (necromantic spells), restoration (wards and healing), and alteration (armor buffs). Custom hair is now included with the mod, there are no other requirements.


[color=red][b]- PLEASE NOTE -[/b][/color]

Muiri does NOT start out as a recruitable follower. She has a vanilla dark brotherhood quest that will raise your relationship with her and make her recruitable. When this quest is finished she will become NON-ESSENTIAL and can be killed. This is how the base game is set up and has nothing to do with my mod. I reccomend using UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul and once her quest is complete simply recruit her and use the "you are important" command to make her essential again.

If you want Muiri to follow you at the start of the game before her quest is complete then open the console and target her, type "setrelationshiprank player 4" (without the parenthesis).[/center]

[center][heading]Technical[/heading][/center]
[u][b]Requirements:[/b][/u]

- No requirements if you are using the current standalone version MKsMuiriFollowerSA.
- Although it is not required I highly recommend using UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul.
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20077//?/]Tribunal Robes and Masks[/url] by Zairaam and Natterforme is REQUIRED if you are using the alternate main file MKsMuiriFollowerSA - wTribunal Robes.


[u][b]Installation:[/b][/u]

I recommend using Nexus Mod manager for installation, easy peasy, no fuss. Feel free, however, to manually install the files by unzipping the downloaded file to your data directory merging the textures and meshes folders then activate the .esp file in your Skyrim launcher.

Place the .esp file at the bottom of your load order with the rest of your companion mods and directly above any UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul .esp's (as shown below).

[i]----------------------------
----------------------------
MKsMuiriFollowerSA.esp=1 <--------------------- right here
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul.esp=1
UFO - Dawnguard AddOn.esp=1
UFO - Heartfire AddOn.esp=1
UFO - Dragonborn AddOn - Unofficial.esp=1
----------------------------
----------------------------
Bashed Patch, 0.esp=1[/i]


[u][b]Uninstallation:[/b][/u]

Simply remove the files or deactivate the mod using NMM.


[u][b]Known Issues:[/b][/u]

- When using the "you could dress better" command in Ultimate Follower Overhaul the NPC will reappear as just a naked (unarmored) body with no head. This is a bug I have seen in other companion mods and I am actively seeking a solution. There is an easy fix however, simply open the console and target the headless NPC then type "resurrect" and hit enter.
- Also, I have altered the NPC's base attributes some (raising health, magicka, and stamina to 100 but in order to get the changes it seems you must start a new game with the mod installed or at least have it installed the first time you enter the room with one of them. The same is true for the alternate main file that changes her default clothing to the black Tribunal Robes.


[u][b]Recommended Mods:[/b][/u]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?/]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037/?/]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045//?/]My Home Is Your Home[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?/]Caliente Female Body Mod BBE[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812/?/]Better Females by Bella[/url]


[u][b]My other mods:[/b][/u]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46972/?/]GMO - Guild Members Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46030//?/]MKs Aela Redone[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45811/?/]Better Bards by MK[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62060/?/]Disgaea - Etna Follower[/url]


[u][b]Armor mods used in screenshots:[/b][/u] (google them):

Succubus By Hentai -CBBE3 Gift By Nausicaa
Vampire leather armor set by RavenDier
Dark Lilith Sexy Armor for CBBE by Nikitaa and Hentai
Lustmord Vampire Armor by AmethystDeceiver
Kankaraya by Kanra (rare mod, steampunk)
Tribunal Robes and Masks by Zairaam and Natterforme


[i]A special thanks goes out to Apachii for her great work on ApachiiSkyHair, for permission to use her hairs in this mod, and for her tutelage![/i]


========================================================================================================================================

[u][b]Change log:[/b][/u]

Version 1.3a
- MKsMuiriFollowerSA - wTribunal Robes 1.3a - Fixed missing robes.

Version 1.3
- Added Icespike spell, removed some lower level spells, and added necromancy perk.

Version 1.2
- Made changes that make her hair compatible with the vampire race.

Version 1.1
- With permission from Apachii I have made a standalone version of this mod that includes her hair style.
author: MurielKai
